text: Dominik Balić (born 4 May 1996) is a Croatian footballer who plays as a defender and also as a midfielder for Melaka United. == References == ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Croatian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Association football midfielders Category:Croatian Second Football League players Category:Malaysia Super League players Category:Croatian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Malaysia Category:Croatian expatriate sportspeople in Malaysia Category:Sportspeople from Split, Croatia Category:NK Dugopolje players Category:Melaka United players
title: Dominik Balić
